Report Typos and Errors

PEPType

String with the name of a polynomial eigensolver

Synopsis

typedef const char* PEPType;
#define PEPLINEAR    "linear"
#define PEPQARNOLDI  "qarnoldi"
#define PEPTOAR      "toar"
#define PEPSTOAR     "stoar"
#define PEPJD        "jd"
#define PEPCISS      "ciss"

See Also

PEPSetType(), PEP

Level

beginner

Location

include/slepcpep.h
